entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tatamagouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:17 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Debert 7:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain or snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
